name: Cross Soul
description:
A girl who is "one person in two bodies" challenging a mystery dungeon.
Items that can be reincarnated to change their form as well as spirit weapons.
The story of a soul that spans the ages.
And... tasty bananas.

Features:
●Protagonists of different strategies

●Item reincarnation and spirit weapons

●A story about the relationships between characters from two different time periods
●Dungeons with a variety of features (Planned for the release version)
●Eastern and Middle-Eastern sounds and visuals that change between scenes
●The excellent "cool & cute" character designs and illustrations of Hidekazu Tomoshibi
●Cute monsters and a heartwarming worldview
